trans-unit.source: Identifies the activation context for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer Aktiveringskonteksten for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The ActivationContext class contains an <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> and provides internal-only access to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ActivationContext inneholder en <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>og gir bare intern tilgang til programmanifestet.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>

trans-unit.source: The activation context is used during manifest-based activation to set up the domain policy and provide an application-based security model.
trans-unit.target: Aktiveringskonteksten brukes under manifest-basert aktivering konfigurere domenepolicyen og angi en applikasjon kodebasert sikkerhet-modell.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>klasse.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Denne typen implementerer den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Når du er ferdig ved hjelp av typen, må du fjerne den direkte eller indirekte.

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne av typen direkte, kan du kalle den <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>metoden i en `try` / `catch` block.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne den indirekte, bruke et språk som `using` (i C#) eller `Using` (i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, se "Ved hjelp av et objekt som implementerer IDisposable" i den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet emnet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the ClickOnce application manifest for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Henter ClickOnce-programmanifest for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: If the activation context is <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Aktiveringskonteksten <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, noe som betyr at programmet ikke er installert i ClickOnce-butikken distribusjon manifestet blir lest fra nedlastingsmappen midlertidig.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: If the activation context is <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Aktiveringskonteksten <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, noe som betyr at programmet er installert i ClickOnce store, distribusjon manifestet blir lest fra ClickOnce-butikken.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om distribusjonen programmanifest [ClickOnce distribusjon Manifest](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce application manifest for the application that is associated with this <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder ClickOnce programmanifest for applikasjonen som er forbundet med denne <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> class using the specified application identity.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: The CreatePartialActivationContext method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreatePartialActivationContext kaller en intern konstruktør for å opprette en ny Aktiveringskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.ActivationContext> class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av den <xref:System.ActivationContext>klassen i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0 er utformet for programmer som verken er fullstendig installert i en butikk eller fullstendig finnes i en mappe.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gir bakoverkompatibilitet for nyere versjoner som gir offentlige konstruktører fullstendig aktiveringskontekster.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies an application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: An object with the specified application identity.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt med den angitte tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: No deployment or application identity is specified in identity.
trans-unit.target: Ingen distribusjon eller program-ID er angitt i identity .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> class using the specified application identity and array of manifest paths.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte tjenesteprogramidentiteten og en rekke manifest baner.

trans-unit.source: The CreatePartialActivationContext method calls an internal constructor to create a new activation context.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreatePartialActivationContext kaller en intern konstruktør for å opprette en ny Aktiveringskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.ActivationContext> class in the .NET Framework version 2.0 is designed for applications that are neither fully installed in a store nor fully contained in a folder.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av den <xref:System.ActivationContext>klassen i .NET Framework, versjon 2.0 er utformet for programmer som verken er fullstendig installert i en butikk eller fullstendig finnes i en mappe.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: This method provides backward compatibility for later releases in which public constructors provide full activation contexts.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden gir bakoverkompatibilitet for nyere versjoner som gir offentlige konstruktører fullstendig aktiveringskontekster.

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies an application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som identifiserer en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: A string array of manifest paths for the application.
trans-unit.target: En strengmatrise manifest baner for programmet.

trans-unit.source: An object with the specified application identity and array of manifest paths.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt med angitt tjenesteprogramidentiteten og matrisen til manifest baner.

trans-unit.source: identity is .
trans-unit.target: identityis .

trans-unit.source: -or- manifestPaths is .
trans-unit.target: -or- manifestPaths is .

trans-unit.source: No deployment or application identity is specified in identity.
trans-unit.target: Ingen distribusjon eller program-ID er angitt i identity .

trans-unit.source: -or- identity does not match the identity in the manifests.
trans-unit.target: - eller - identity samsvarer ikke med identiteten i programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: -or- identity does not have the same number of components as the manifest paths.
trans-unit.target: - eller - identity ikke har samme antall komponenter som manifest baner.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ClickOnce deployment manifest for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Henter ClickOnce distribusjon manifestet for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: If the activation context is <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, meaning that the application is not installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the temporary download folder.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Aktiveringskonteksten <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, noe som betyr at programmet ikke er installert i ClickOnce-butikken distribusjon manifestet blir lest fra nedlastingsmappen midlertidig.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: If the activation context is <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, meaning that the application is installed in the ClickOnce store, the deployment manifest is read from the ClickOnce store.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Aktiveringskonteksten <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>, noe som betyr at programmet er installert i ClickOnce store, distribusjon manifestet blir lest fra ClickOnce-butikken.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: For more information about deployment manifests, see [ClickOnce Deployment Manifest](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om distribusjonen programmanifest [ClickOnce distribusjon Manifest](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the ClickOnce deployment manifest for the application that is associated with this <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder ClickOnce distribusjon manifestet for applikasjonen som er forbundet med denne <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ActivationContext>.
trans-unit.target: Kall avhending når du er ferdig med <xref:System.ActivationContext>.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ActivationContext> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Fjerningsmetoden forlater den <xref:System.ActivationContext>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ActivationContext> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ActivationContext> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter å avhending, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.ActivationContext>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.ActivationContext>ble bruker.</xref:System.ActivationContext> </xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ActivationContext>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall fjerne før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.ActivationContext>.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ActivationContext> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.ActivationContext>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.ActivationContext>

trans-unit.source: Enables an <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.ActivationContext"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref> objekt under forsøk på å frigjøre ressurser og rydde andre før den <xref href="System.ActivationContext"> </xref> gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the form, or store context, for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Henter skjemaet eller store konteksten for gjeldende program.

trans-unit.source: A manifest-based application might not be installed in the ClickOnce store.
trans-unit.target: Et manifest-basert program er kanskje ikke installert i ClickOnce-butikken.

trans-unit.source: An application that is not in the store, such as a manifest-activated application executing in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], is classified as <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>.
trans-unit.target: En applikasjon som ikke er i butikken, for eksempel et manifest-aktivert program kjøres i [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], er klassifisert som <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: An application that is contained in the store is classified as <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>.
trans-unit.target: Et program som ligger i butikken er klassifisert som <xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>.</xref:System.ActivationContext.ContextForm>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application identity for the current application.
trans-unit.target: Henter tjenesteprogramidentiteten for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity> uniquely identifies an application by its full name and location.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>identifiserer et program av fullstendig navn og plassering.</xref:System.ApplicationIdentity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> object that identifies the current application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> -objekt som identifiserer gjeldende program.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> med data som kreves for å serialisere målobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The structure for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Strukturen for denne serialisering.
